items.title: What Is Take Back The Classroom?: Book Censorship News, November 14, 2025
items.description: With the closure of BookLooks, we've seen the rise of Take Back the Classroom. But what is this website and how do their book "reviews" work?

items.title: Two-Tier Audiobooks and More News for Library Workers
items.description: Catch up with the latest book award news, the changing world of audiobooks, upcoming releases, and more stories curated for library workers.

items.title: Celebrating Indigenous Nonfiction
items.description: Read your way into some of the best new nonfiction by Native writers that hit shelves this year.

items.title: An Ode to Speech Bubbles in Comics
items.description: When was the last time you stopped to consider the shape, size, and design of comic speech bubbles?

items.title: 9 of the Best and Worst Frankenstein Adaptations
items.description: FRANKENSTEIN is back and hotter than ever in pop culture. But what adaptations are worth seeking out and which are worth a skip?
